entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
